title: Surf beach [Greek version]
creator_credit: John Martin-Jones, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Bern Gandy
brief_description: The hundreds of thousands of Australians whovisit the beach each summer seldom realise that ceaseless work is required to keep the beach clean andsafe. This film shows the activities of those on Bondi beach who work to protect swimmers and guarantee their enjoyment of the beach. NB: In Greek language with no English subtitles.
